title: Julián Castro | Trump Lashes Out After Pelosi Accuses Him of a "Cover-Up": A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's impromptu press conference today, in which he lashed out at Democrats calling for his impeachment.

Then, Julián Castro talks about getting hired by President Obama, Ben Carson's work as U.S. Secretary of Housing and Urban Development and the Obama administration's record on immigration.

He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
